pros: They have good work life balance and take care of their employees
cons: They don't give generous PTO or healthcare for dependents

job_title: Junior Product Manager in Orlando, FL
pros: If you're looking for professional experience covered in the core values of prayer, accelerating the gospel, and pioneering the world of problem-solving, working at Jesus Film Project, specifically Digital Strategies, is the place for you.
cons: If you're not comfortable with some degree of ambiguity, then this innovative environment might not be your best fit. The culture of Digital Strategies within Jesus Film Project encourages innovation. While they do provide onboarding and culture expectations, it's up to you to craft, initiate and sustain the vision.

pros: JFP is a great culture to work in!
cons: There could be better base pay for salaried and paid staff.

job_title: Full Time Missionary in Orlando, FL
pros: Flexible, Great Cause, Opportunity to try many jobs.
cons: you can get lots of types of people you interact with.

review_title: Passionate people, frustrating attitude toward cultural compassion internally
pros:
Many people with a deep desire to serve the Lord.
Relatively good medical plans (no birth control coverage)
cons: Frustrating attitude toward cultural compassion internally, voices and concerns of POC staff often drowned out (See news coverage on issue).

job_title: Senior Software Engineer in Akron, OH
pros:
- Getting to work on projects that tell people about Jesus
- Community of like-minded people on mission to change the world
- Opportunity to shape the tech stack
cons: - Need more developers! The harvest is plentiful yet the labourers are few.
